qas.question: What did some Mozni regard themselves with?
What did the magnates do to the Piasts realms?

answers.text: attempted to deprive them of their independence

qas.question: Who constantly sought to undermine princely authority?

context: Some możni (Magnates) descending from past tribal dynasties regarded themselves as <a0_0>co-proprietors of Piast realms<a0_0/>, even though the Piasts <a1_0>attempted to deprive them of their independence<a1_0/>. These <a2_0>możni<a2_0/> (Magnates) constantly sought to undermine princely authority.:75, 76 In Gall Anonym's chronicle, there is noted the nobility's alarm when the Palatine Sieciech "elevated those of a lower class over those who were noble born" entrusting them with state offices. (Manteuffel 1982, p. 149)
